content:
I don't know if this is the right channel, please correct me if not.

In #79045 (comment) it turned out, that it's not possible to ping the allocator-WG. Does it make sense to create a team or similar to ping the members of the WG? Or add a configuration to the rustbot?
@Tim Diekmann This channel is fine, I think you should make a team for the group on the rust-lang/team repo that will create a ping-able team.
